name: CentroMac-Digital
description:
The goal of the company is to provide services that meet the needs of its customers using the most appropriate technological resources, above the trends imposed by the market, our vision is based on the certainty that computer technology is an enhancer and facilitator of communication and human interrelation Development of multimedia applications merging different tools and last generation resources .
Development of customized systems for the government as well as for companies through the integration of different technologies.
